ResearchProjectDef.label: Strengthen Fortification
ResearchProjectDef.description: Investigate how to build a sturdy defensive building. Unlock Bunker that can accommodate up to four combat units.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Chem-Gas Refining
ResearchProjectDef.description: Finding a way to refine an advance energy - ChemGas. Researchers seem to hear a female voice:"Insufficient Vespene Gas."

ResearchProjectDef.label: Auto-Turret
ResearchProjectDef.description: Investigate a new type of automatic turret which can repel the enemy with intensive firepower. The SRTS Engine can be installed for redeployment.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Planetary Fortress
ResearchProjectDef.description: Investigate how to build a Planetary Fortress, a heavy and deadly front-line fortress with heavy cannons. The SRTS Engine can be installed for redeployment.
